#summary extract a block and create a new class that is used in place of the block with parameters as needed.

See [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Strategy_pattern The Strategy Pattern] for details about the strategy pattern.

This refactoring will result in a new class, the strategy, to be created which is potentially injected into the original class, thus enabling different strategies to be used by the original class.

I guess it could be argued that this is just [http://www.refactoring.com/catalog/replaceMethodWithMethodObject.html Replace Method With Method Object] + [http://www.refactoring.com/catalog/extractInterface.html Extract Interface].
